Sanjay Niradhar Yojana ( State fund)
Applicable for - 1.destitute person below 65 age 2.handicap 3.orphan 4.critical illness 5.fred from prostitution 6.outrage person
benefits- 1.600rs per month for single beneficiary 2.900/- per month for two or more beneficiaries in family. 3.Income less or up to 21,000/-
How to apply- Collector office/tahsildar/TalitIa. submit application online form https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/.
Documents required- Application form Certificate of residence Certificate of Age Certificate of income or proof for poverty line. Certificate of Incapacity/disease issued from government hospital.
